```{r results='asis'}
all_sigsum <- sort(unlist(strsplit(params$sigsum_collected, ",")))

# Loop through the list and display images
for (img_path in all_sigsum) {
  cat(paste0('<img src="', img_path, '" width="500"/><br>'))
}
```
